HISTORY.NO_SURVEYS: You haven't filled in any questionnaires yet

INTRO.TITLE: The Self-assessment tool
INTRO.DESCRIPTION: The tool is mostly tailor made for 55+ employees. It focuses on three areas technological proficiency, workplace integration skills, and well-being and job satisfaction. You can test it and find out your strong skills in each area. Each part is evaluated separately. You do not have to complete them all. You can choose what interests you or what is important to you.

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Who we are
WHO_WE_ARE.DESCRIPTION_1: This self-assessment tool has been developed as part of the project "A practical approach to support the healthy adaptation and integration of workers aged 55+ into the labour market". The consortium of implementers includes representatives from the following countries Czech Republic, Slovenia, Hungary, Slovakia, Germany, Croatia, Serbia, Bulgaria, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

OUR_GOAL.TITLE: Our goal
OUR_GOAL.DESCRIPTION_1: The project aims to support the healthy integration of older workers (55+) into the labour market, to capitalise on their knowledge and to help them adapt to the challenges of new ways of working. The aim is to increase their participation, avoid early retirement and prolong their productive life.
OUR_GOAL.DESCRIPTION_2: The Self-assessment tool can be useful especially for individuals and their personal development planning, but also for companies (in terms of HR, diversity and inclusion strategies, and personalized development) and for policy makers.

TAKE_SURVEY.TITLE: Take the questionnaire
TAKE_SURVEY.DESCRIPTION: Explore your strengths and discover areas for improvement with our self-assessment tool tailored for those aged 55+. Participate now and take a step towards enhancing your career and personal development.

FILL_SURVEY.FILL_REGISTER_DESC: By registering, you gain full access to all the features of our self-assessment tool. Your results will be securely stored, allowing you to track your progress over time and compare your scores across different areas. Additionally, registration gives you the flexibility to save any incomplete questionnaires, so you can return to them later at your convenience.
FILL_SURVEY.FILL_WITHOUT_REGISTER_DESC: If you choose not to register, you can still fully engage with the self-assessment tool and view your results upon completion. However, please note that without registration, your results will not be saved, and you wonâ€™t be able to track your progress over time.
